meanings.definition: A plant of the legume family, used as a laxative.
meanings.sent1: The senna plant grows in the garden and helps with digestion.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother takes senna to help her with constipation.
meanings.sent3: Why did the senna plant go to the doctor? It had a stomachache!
meanings.sent4: The senna plant is like a gentle broom sweeping away tummy troubles.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the senna plant are nature's remedy for a sluggish stomach.

meanings.definition: A preparation made from the leaves or pods of the senna plant, used as a laxative.
meanings.sent1: I bought some senna from the pharmacy to relieve my stomachache.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended senna tea to help with my digestion.
meanings.sent3: Why did the senna preparation refuse to work? It was feeling too shy!
meanings.sent4: The senna remedy works like a gentle breeze clearing out digestive woes.
meanings.sent5: The herbal senna potion is a natural solution for a sluggish gut.
